articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Range Resources suspends dividend, cuts 2020 capital expenditure
articles.description: Range Resources Corp said on Monday it will suspend its dividend and cut capital expenditure for the year, as the natural gas producer focuses on reducing debt.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Range Resources Corp (RRC.N) said on Monday it will suspend its dividend and cut capital expenditure for the year, as the natural gas producer focuses on reducing debt. 
The company, which had declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.02 per share… [+841 chars]

articles.author: Svea Herbst-Bayliss
articles.title: Left's Citron hedge fund posts 43 pct gain in first year
articles.description: Andrew Left, who has long targeted companies that he thinks are over-valued through his work at Citron Research, told investors on Monday that his new hedge fund returned 43% after fees in 2019, its first year in business.
articles.content:
BOSTON (Reuters) - Andrew Left, who has long targeted companies that he thinks are over-valued through his work at Citron Research, told investors on Monday that his new hedge fund returned 43% after fees in 2019, its first year in business.

articles.author: Luke Baker
articles.title: Between U.S. and Iran, EU powers try mediation and pressure to ease crisis
articles.description: Germany, Britain and France are scrambling to keep talks with Iran over its 2015 nuclear agreement alive despite Tehran having all but torn up the deal after the United States killed its top military commander.
articles.content:
LONDON/PARIS/BRUSSELS (Reuters) - Germany, Britain and France are scrambling to keep talks with Iran over its 2015 nuclear agreement alive despite Tehran having all but torn up the deal after the United States killed its top military commander.

articles.author: Denise Paglinawan
articles.title: Health report confirms air contamination in Toronto subway
articles.description: Air in Toronto’s subway system is polluted, the public health department said in a report issued on Monday calling on the transit system to mitigate it.
articles.content:
TORONTO (Reuters) - Air in Toronto’s subway system is polluted, the public health department said in a report issued on Monday calling on the transit system to mitigate it.

articles.description: Spanish lawmakers are expected to vote by the narrowest of margins on Tuesday to confirm Socialist leader Pedro Sanchez as head of a left-wing coalition government.

MADRID (Reuters) - Spanish lawmakers are expected to vote by the narrowest of margins on Tuesday to confirm Socialist leader Pedro Sanchez as head of a left-wing coalition government.

articles.title: Top U.S. diplomat Pompeo not planning 2020 Senate run: media reports
articles.description: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo told Senate Republican Leader Mitch McConnell on Monday he does not plan to run for a U.S. Senate seat in Kansas in 2020, according to media reports.
articles.content:

articles.author: Lisa Rapaport
articles.title: Few doctors can legally prescribe opioid-addiction drug
articles.description: (Reuters Health) - Fewer than one in 10 primary care providers in the U.S. can prescribe the opioid-addiction medication buprenorphine, and access is even more scarce in rural counties hardest hit by overdoses, a new study suggests.

articles.author: Steve Gorman
articles.title: Bus driver, two passengers and two truckers perished in Pennsylvania Turnpike wreck
articles.description: The five people killed in a multi-vehicle pileup on the Pennsylvania Turnpike over the weekend were identified on Monday as the driver of the tour bus that crashed first, two of his passengers, and two UPS employees whose truck plowed into the bus.
